I.name: Hextech Capacitor
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Each time '''Jayce''' switches between {{sbc|{{ai|Transform Mercury Hammer|Jayce|Hammer Stance}}}} and {{sbc|{{ai|Transform Mercury Cannon|Jayce|Cannon Stance}}}} he gains {{sti|ms|{{as|40 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{tip|ghosting}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
I.descriptionHtml: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between Jayce's Hammer Stance and Jayce's Cannon Stance he gains 40 bonus movement speed and ghosting for 0.75 seconds.

Q1.name: To the Skies!
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target enemy's location and smashes his hammer on the ground upon arrival, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies within an area and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds.
''{{ai|Lightning Field|Jayce}}'' can be cast during the dash.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce leaps to the target enemy's location and smashes his hammer on the ground upon arrival, dealing physical damage to all enemies within an area and slowing them for 2 seconds.
Jayce's Lightning Field can be cast during the dash.
Q1.notes: * ''To The Skies!'' will always direct '''Jayce''' linearly to his target's location.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Slow: %

Q2.name: Shock Blast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' fires an electric bolt in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy or max range, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies and briefly granting {{tip|sight}} of the area.
If the bolt passes through {{ai|Acceleration Gate|Jayce}}, it supercharges: dealing 40% increased damage with increased speed, range and explosion.
Q2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce fires an electric bolt in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy or max range, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and briefly granting sight of the area.
If the bolt passes through Jayce's Acceleration Gate, it supercharges: dealing 40% increased damage with increased speed, range and explosion.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|55 to 330 6}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}|{{ai|Acceleration Gate|Jayce|Accelerated}} Damage|{{ap|55*1.4 to 330*1.4 6}} {{as|(+ 168% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
Q2.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* Upon touching {{ai|Acceleration Gate|Jayce}}, the enhanced missile gains its remaining range equal to [ 1600 units - travelled distance of the standard missile ].
** This means that the range of the enhanced ''Shock Blast'' is always the same, regardless of how early or late it interacted with ''Acceleration Gate''.
** Supercharging the ''Shock Blast'' as soon as possible, however, will improve its average speed significantly. 
*** For this, '''Jayce''' must stand inside or very close to the ''Acceleration Gate'', or place it very close to himself right after ''Shock Blast's'' cast time.
* ''Shock Blast's'' effect radius is centered around the location of the missile as it collides.
** ''Shock Blast'' will '''always''' damage the enemy it collided with, even if it is so large that it is outside the effect radius.
* The non-enhanced ''Shock Blast'' detonation has a slightly smaller sight radius than the radius in which it deals damage.{{bug|2}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)
  • Jayce's Accelerated Damage: (+ 168% bonus AD)

W1.name: Lightning Field
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to all nearby enemies over the duration.
W1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Jayce's basic attacks restore mana on-hit.
Active: Jayce surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all nearby enemies over the duration.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|25 to 100 6}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|25*4 to 100*4 6}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 25% AP)
  • Total Magic Damage: (+ 100% AP)

W2.name: Hyper Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' gains {{sti|attack speed|{{as|300% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} on his next 3 [[basic attack]]s within 4 seconds, each one dealing modified damage.
''Hyper Charge'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Jayce's''' basic attack timer, and the modified damage is affected by {{tip|critical strike|critical strike}} modifiers.
W2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce gains 300% bonus attack speed on his next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds, each one dealing modified damage.
Hyper Charge resets Jayce's basic attack timer, and the modified damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.
W2.notes:
* The last basic attack is checked [[on-hit]] rather than [[on-attack]].
** If {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} or {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} hit the target before the basic attack does, the basic attack damage will not be modified.

E1.name: Thundering Blow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|monsters}}, while also {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them to a location 500 units in front of him.
E1.descriptionHtml: Active: Jayce swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing magic damage, capped against monsters, while also pulling them to a location 500 units in front of him.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|8 to 20 6}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Maximum Monster Damage|{{ap|200 to 700 6}}}}

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: % of target's maximum health (+ 100% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Monster Damage:

st_slices: % of target's maximum health (+ 100% bonus AD)

E2.name: Acceleration Gate
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' deploys an energy gate centered at the target location for 4 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of its area. All allied champions that touch the gate will gain {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 3 seconds.
The buff is continuously refreshed inside the gate.
''Acceleration Gate will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce deploys an energy gate centered at the target location for 4 seconds, granting sight of its area. All allied champions that touch the gate will gain bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
The buff is continuously refreshed inside the gate.
Acceleration Gate will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
E2.notes: * The ''Gate'' grants the bonus in an area {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 750 units wide and {{tip|er|icononly = true}} 100 units thick.

R1.name: Transform Mercury Cannon
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' transforms into {{cci|Transform Mercury Cannon.png||{{sbc|Cannon Stance}}}}, receiving access to its [[champion ability|abilities]], becoming {{tip|ranged}} with {{sti|500 attack range}}, and empowering his next [[basic attack]] to reduce the target's {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} by {{pp|key=%|10 to 25 for 4|1 to 16}} for 5 seconds.
R1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce transforms into Cannon Stance">Unknown value: cci / Transform Mercury Cannon.png / / Cannon Stance, receiving access to its champion ability, becoming ranged with 500 attack range, and empowering his next basic attack to reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by 1 to 16 ‒ undefined for 5 seconds.
Unknown value: Data Jayce/Transform Mercury Hammer / pst2 / description2
R1.notes:
* Transformations do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The resistance reduction does not apply to structures.
* Both ''Transform'' on-hit effects have no set duration and will only be consumed when ''Jayce'' either lands a basic attack or switches stances.
* The enhanced attack will not be consumed if it is parried ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}, and {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}).
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.

R2.name: Transform Mercury Hammer
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jayce''' transforms into {{cci|Transform Mercury Hammer.png||{{sbc|Hammer Stance}}}}, receiving access to its [[champion ability|abilities]], becoming {{tip|melee}} with {{sti|125 attack range}}, gaining {{pp|5 to 35 for 4|1 to 16}} {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, and empowering his next basic attack to deal {{as|{{pp|25 to 145 for 4|1 to 16}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
'''Jayce''' begins the game with ''Transform'' but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] each have 6 ranks.
R2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jayce transforms into Hammer Stance">Unknown value: cci / Transform Mercury Hammer.png / / Hammer Stance, receiving access to its champion ability, becoming melee with 125 attack range, gaining 1 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus armor and bonus magic resistance, and empowering his next basic attack to deal 1 to 16 ‒ undefined (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus magic damage.
Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic Champion ability each have 6 ranks.
R2.notes:
*Transformations do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The enhanced attack will not be consumed if it is parried ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}, and {{ai|Riposte|Fiora}}).
* The ''Mercury Hammer's'' bonus damage can affect structures.
* Both ''Transform'' on-hit effects have no set duration and will only be consumed when '''Jayce''' either lands a basic attack or switches stances.
* The empowered attack will not trigger against [[ward]]s.
